name: THREE NIGHT WITH ALESHA
description:
Went outside the window Alesha, cover your mouse over the red button to close the door!
If you stare at the cameras for a long time, Alesha can kill you.

To open the camera click on the tablet on the right, and exit them with the left mouse.

The orange button and the numbers on top of it are pies, if they go down to 0 Alesha will eat you!

To top up the pies hover your mouse over the orange button!
